description:
Jakoh decrees to Falco that if he wants to save the Celestial Emperor, he must strike down Kenshiro. Reasoning that if he lost to Kenshiro, Jakoh would pin all the blame on the Celestial Emperor and make a break for it, Falco hands one of his loyal henchmen and his lover Myu the detonator switch to a bomb in the Imperial Capital, then sets out for battle. Finally, the stage is set for a major confrontation between him and Kenshiro!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les sanglots de l`empereur trahi ! Où est Falco ?
Teito ni Kodamasu Tentei no Nakigoe! Falco wa Izukoni...
The Emperor`s Cries Echoes Through the Imperial Capital! Falco, Where Have You Gone?
帝都にこだます天帝の鳴き声! ファルコはいずこに...
